description: This file contains validation functions for media content, including text and media validation, ratio calculations, and specific channel validation functions for WhatsApp and Facebook, along with utility functions.

methods.name: safeString
methods.description: Converts a value to string, defaulting to empty string if null or undefined.

methods.name: isFiniteNumber
methods.description: Checks if a value is a finite number.

methods.name: gcd
methods.description: Calculates the greatest common divisor of two numbers.

methods.name: simplifyRatio
methods.description: Simplifies width and height to their ratio form.

methods.name: ratioDistance
methods.description: Calculates the difference between two aspect ratios.

methods.name: closestRecommendedRatio
methods.description: Finds the closest recommended aspect ratio to given dimensions.

methods.name: validateText
methods.description: Validates text length against maximum allowed characters.

methods.name: validateMedia
methods.description: Validates media type, size, aspect ratio, and duration against configuration.

methods.name: validateForChannel
methods.description: Validates content for a specific channel based on its configuration.

methods.name: formatBytes
methods.description: Formats byte size into human-readable string.
